Adventure Guildsman:
Adventurers between level 40 and 54 can use the following Support Magic:
The Buff Set for Warriors: has Berserker Spirit, Might, Shield, Wind Walk, Focus, Death Whisper, Guidance, Bless Shield, Blessed Body, Haste, Agility and Vampiric Rage. The Buff Set for Wizards: has Berserker Spirit, Shield, Wind Walk, Blessed Body, Blessed Soul, Magic Barrier, Empower and Acumen.
Buff Set for Warriors - 4000 points.
Buff Set for Wizards - 2100 points.
After selected, receiving individual buff.
